nodes.text: The Mataou Imperial garrison was an Imperial garrison located on the planet Mataou, a former Hutt jewel world of the Anoat sector. After Governor Ubrik Adelhard ordered the blockade of the entire sector in response to the Empire's defeat at Endor, the Imperials sent troops to reinforce the Mataou garrison, tripling the number they had originally.
The Smuggler and their crew were tasked with removing the added troops on behalf of the Trade Spine League.
